archimate:BusinessEvent.name: <<ThreatEvent>> Code Injection
archimate:BusinessEvent.documentation:
Code injection is the exploitation of a computer bug that is caused by processing invalid data. Injection is used by an attacker to introduce (or "inject") code into a vulnerable computer program and change the course of execution. e.g. SQL Injection, Cross Site Scripting, etc
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Code_injection
